title: Alibi Ike cinema slide
creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures and Ray Enright
credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: Joe E. Brown & Ruth Donnelly ‘He’s ‘Dizzy!’ ‘He’s ‘Daffy!’ A Laff Riot with a Brand-New Twist! “Alibi Ike” For General Exhibition Gunn Slide Gum edged tape reads: Gunn Slide 9 Collins Place, Melb. Cen
